CustomField.formula: If( TCO_Lifecycle_Input__r.Construction_Use_Cost__c, (TCO_Lifecycle_Input__r.Construction_Monthly_Cost__c * Months_Construction__c), 0) + If( TCO_Lifecycle_Input__r.Planning_and_Pre_design_Use_Cost__c , Pre_design_Cost__c, 0) + If( TCO_Lifecycle_Input__r.Design_Use_Cost__c, Design_Cost__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Initial Cost
